title: Reminiscences of Yarrow. Edited and annotated by ... Professor Veitch, LL.D. Illustrated by Tom Scott ... Second edition
author: Russell, James
snippet: Miss Christian Scott of Todshawhaugh(afterwards wife of James Dickson, Esq. of House-byres) then boarded with Miss Beattie, sat at thehead, I next her, and then my sister.
